title: Jhin Release Date OCE
body: So patch 6.2 came out a few days ago and in the patch notes it was stated that Jhin would be released a week after the patch. Does this mean he will be released exactly 7 days after the patch or just sometime during the week after the patch (i.e. anywhere between patch date and a week later) ?? Curious to hear everyone's thoughts seeing that I am so keen on this champ being an adc main and all.

replies.body: what do you mean? i have been playing blitzcrank for weeks now

"Jhin, the Virtuoso, will be released the week after patch 6.2's launch! To learn more, check the following links:"
They said "The week after" not "A week after" 
From my understanding, that means any day between 6.2 and a week later.

{{champion:202}} Just thought u wanted to know : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QvNw0A-D0T0&feature=youtu.be {{champion:202}} 

{{champion:202}}  Its the spotlight {{champion:202}}
last time I checked i swore i saw that his abilities scale off ap?

dude your kinda wrong jhin scales hard ad with about a 0.7 ad scaling on q his traps scale a bit of ap but when you buy crit and attack speed items on him it turns it into extra ad because of his passive{{champion:202}}
Anywhere between now and the next several years
